summary: This is an email from a prosecutor requesting approval to travel with case agents to interview a victim and potential witness for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The travel is planned for April 12-15, 2021, to conduct interviews and discuss trial testimony.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the case for which the travel is being requested; she is the defendant in an upcoming trial.

events.title: Travel to interview victim/witness
events.description: Prosecutor and case agents plan to fly out to interview a victim and potential witness for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

events.title: Return from witness interviews
events.description: Planned return date from the trip to interview the victim and potential witness.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell trial
events.description: Upcoming trial of Ghislaine Maxwell referenced as occurring in the summer of 2021.

keyFacts: A prosecutor requested travel approval in April 2021 to interview a victim and potential witness for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The planned travel dates were April 12-15, 2021, involving a long flight with a layover.
The purpose was to debrief the victim and discuss their testimony for the upcoming summer trial.
The email indicates ongoing trial preparation by the prosecution team in the Maxwell case.
